alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Duchesne County through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, mesonet observations reported a strong thunderstorm over Myton, or near Roosevelt, moving east at 30 mph. Additional strong thunderstorms are developing west of Duchesne. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Duchesne, Myton, Starvation Reservoir, Upalco, Arcadia, Cedarview, Utahn and Bridgeland. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 74 and 115. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 59 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin
